Package src.model.game

Class QuartoHistory

java.lang.Object
src.model.game.QuartoHistory
public class QuartoHistory extends Object
The QuartoHistory class represents a historical record of moves in the Quarto game. It keeps track of each move made during the game, including the selection of pawns and their placement on the game board.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    QuartoHistory()
    Constructs a new QuartoHistory object representing the start of the game.
    QuartoHistory​(int newLine, int newColumn, QuartoHistory p, String name, int player)
    Constructs a QuartoHistory object representing the placement of a pawn on the game board.
    QuartoHistory​(int index, QuartoHistory p, String name, int player)
    Constructs a QuartoHistory object representing the selection of a pawn.

    • QuartoHistory

      public QuartoHistory​(int index, QuartoHistory p, String name, int player)
      Constructs a QuartoHistory object representing the selection of a pawn.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the selected pawn.
      p - The previous move in the game history.
      name - The name of the player making the move.
      player - The number of the current player.

    • QuartoHistory

      public QuartoHistory​(int newLine, int newColumn, QuartoHistory p, String name, int player)
      Constructs a QuartoHistory object representing the placement of a pawn on the game board.
      Parameters:
      newLine - The line on the game board where the pawn is placed.
      newColumn - The column on the game board where the pawn is placed.
      p - The previous move in the game history.
      name - The name of the player making the move.
      player - The number of the current player.
